interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LUXAZA 6 PCS Purple Eyeshadow Stick,Light Shimmer Cream Eyeshadow Crayon,Pro Smoky Waterproof & Long Lasting Eyeshadow Stick Set
Review Date: 2020/12/17
Store: LUXAZA
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LUXAZA', 'Item Form': 'Crayon,Cream Eyeshadow', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '5.83 x 5 x 0.87 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: These are fun and easy to use.  I like that color  easily apply the color I want quickly.  The colors aren't my cuppa but I can work with them.  I was able to blend with a more neutral shade to get the perfect look that I wanted.
Review Title: A good eyeshadow pencil
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
AIKIMUSE Eyebrow Pen BRUNETTE AIKIMUSE {'Brand': 'AIKIMUSE', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.58 x 4 x 0.75 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} This product started off promising but after one eye the color stopped coming out. Also the delineation between the four prongs blended into one.
It could have been better but sadly it's not working. Started off good but QIC 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara, Fiber Mascara, Waterproof Mascara, Natural Thick Thickening and Lengthening Mascara Lasting All Day, Waterproof, Smudge Proof Eyelashes Joruby {'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Waterproof', 'Brand': 'Joruby', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 2 x 1 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} I'm always looking for a good mascara that will make my lashes appear thicker and longer. I thought this product worked well. Some other fiber mascara 's have various steps to achieve this while this is a one step process. I do find d the fiber mascara to be thicker and sticker than traditional mascara 's.
Although this does have a faint odor it worked well Good but a little smelly Purple Hair Mask for Blonde with Keratin & Jojoba Oil - Platinum & Silver Hair - Instantly Eliminate Brassiness & Yellows - Made in USA - Hair Toner - Bleached & Highlighted Hair - Sulfate Free - 8 oz WELLUTION {'Brand': 'WELLUTION', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Dry,Color-treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating Treatment', 'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 2.9 x 2.8 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '749715278440'} I’m outside a lot in the summer and my hair sees a lot of sun and chlorine from the pool. It’s also becoming lighter with more grey. I was excited about trying this. I’ve used it for a few days and adult didn’t notice a huge change in the tone. It does feel somewhat softer though
I’m also not a fan of the packaging. There isn’t a pump or squeeze bottle. You just stick your hand in the jar. Not a change in tone PHOERA 30ml Foundation Liquid Full Coverage 24HR Matte Oil Control Concealer (Nude & Buff Beige) with 6ml Makeup Face Primer & Kabuki Foundation Brush Flat Top SIGHTLING {'Product Dimensions': '1.18 x 0.79 x 1.18 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '779296966696'} I really liked the look and feel of this foundation. It went on easily for a full coverage smooth look. I usually use a sponge when applying foundation but I really liked the easy of the brush. The only downside is that neither color worked. Great coverage LAPOTHICELL Blemish Out Serum 55mL, Blemish care, soothing care, for brighten & luminous skin LAPOTHICELL {'Product Dimensions': '1.65 x 1.65 x 4.13 inches; 3.77 Ounces'} I've been using this for about a week a cm I know it usually takes about 21 days to see a change but I'm hopeful that the positive results will continue. I have sun damage spots and I'm hoping to diminish them for a more even skin tone. This product is easy to use. You use the dropper and spread the product on you face. I like to use at night after washing my face but I suppose you can use it in the morning if you prefer. It does go on a little sticky but it dries quickly. Refreshing LUXAZA 6 PCS Purple Eyeshadow Stick,Light Shimmer Cream Eyeshadow Crayon,Pro Smoky Waterproof & Long Lasting Eyeshadow Stick Set LUXAZA {'Brand': 'LUXAZA', 'Item Form': 'Crayon,Cream Eyeshadow', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '5.83 x 5 x 0.87 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} These are fun and easy to use. I like that color easily apply the color I want quickly. The colors aren't my cuppa but I can work with them. I was able to blend with a more neutral shade to get the perfect look that I wanted. A good eyeshadow pencil
profile:
**User Summary:**

The user's beauty product preferences continue to evolve, now including a focus on skincare, particularly blemish care intended to enhance skin luminosity and reduce sun damage spots. Their commitment to achieving a more even skin tone reflects a dedication to overall skin health. They maintain a strong interest in eyebrow enhancement products for a natural finish and prioritize mascaras that provide significant volume and length with ease of use. Additionally, their exploration of hair care products for color-treated hair remains steady, along with an appreciation for foundations that deliver full coverage and a smooth finish.

Quality expectations remain high, with the user valuing reliability and effectiveness; they consistently offer constructive feedback, noting both strengths and weaknesses. Their recent purchase of an eyeshadow product highlights their willingness to explore new makeup items while focusing on ease of application. Despite mixed feelings about the color selection, they demonstrate adaptability by combining shades for desired outcomes.

Rating trends indicate a discerning eye; the user assigns mixed ratings when products fall short of expectations but is willing to offer high marks to those that satisfy. Overall, their preferences emphasize a holistic approach to beauty, prioritizing effective and functional products across skincare and makeup categories while maintaining a commitment to thorough and balanced feedback. Their recent experiences underscore a growing interest in versatile makeup options that enhance convenience and creativity in their beauty routine.
